original_title: Water cannons fired at IUBF protest in Town Hall
original_body_lines: Police have fired water cannons in attempts to disperse a protest staged by student Buddhist monks near the Lipton Roundabout in Town Hall.
Accordingly, the members of Inter-University Bikkhu Federation (IUBF) were marching towards the Univeristy Grants Commission (UGC), when the police fired water cannons, Ada Derana learns.
